info.name: Medium sans serif
info.description: make Medium use sans serif font, because serif is annoying. also on 3rd-party domain Medium blogs.
info.additionalInfo: the example page in the screenshot is an article i wrote, "avoid implementation inheritance" changelog: 2018-12-20: add blog.color.com 2018-11-28: add arcdigital.media 2018-10-18: add blog.sindresorhus.com 2018-09-14: add blog.discordapp.com 2018-09-01: add hackernoon.com 2017-06-09: add Slack's blog, slackhq.com 2017-05-28: change font size to medium; add blog.trakt.tv 2017-05-09: add blog.twitch.tv 2016-03-06: apply to lists, too 2016-02-02: fix for changes in Medium's code
